workwithus.w_content:
We are looking for interns
and full time staff who are
interested in projects related
to online and offline advertising,
interactive design, social media
& project management.

whoweare.wh_content:
Just like dinosaurs live on
in our imaginations, we bring
brands to life by giving them
a personality and a depth that
makes them part of the world
we live in.
As a creative brand partner
we firmly believe in the benefit
of being involved in the full
lifecycle of a product,
from inception and development
through to its marketing
and delivery into the hands
of customers.

 

Any element of a business
needs creativity to thrive,
and that is how we approach
all our work at Dinosaur –
how can we apply creative
solutions to the challenges
that must be met to make
our clients successful.

 

THE DINO DIFFERENCE
Dinosaur is your partner
in the creative journey, which
means we are able to develop
close working relationships
with clients and gain a very strong
understanding of their needs.
Our office is located in a villa
surrounded by lush gardens,
and you are more than welcome
to stop by and see the Dinos
in their natural habitat and
discuss how we can help make
the difference for your business.

whatwedo.wha_content:
We are a multi-talented bunch
of Dinos, and we work across
any and all communication
platforms to meet our clients’
diverse needs.

 

At Dinosaur we make use
of every tool available to create
iconic brands and tell their
story by making an emotional
connection between our clients
and consumers.
From devising strategy and
conceiving concepts through
to production and execution,
Dinosaur can deliver.

 

We are also busy developing
our own Dino products,
from beautifully designed
objects through to multi-faceted
Dino communication channels.

Come the weekend, we have
also been known to bust a pretty
sweet move on the dance floor.

howwedoit.h_content:
Our method is simple.
We work closely with our clients
and collaborators to conceive
and produce the most creative
and effective work.

 

Being big on talent and
dedication but small in size
gives us, and our clients,
a distinct advantage.
The personal service we provide
and the accessibility of every
member of the Dinosaur team
means we can ensure clients
are getting exactly what
they want, and we can
respond quickly to challenges
and opportunities.

 

It all starts with a conversation.
Let’s talk about how Dinosaur
can help provide what you need
to get results for your business.

game.g_content:
If you have an idea for
an interactive game, children’s
book or application using
Dinosaurs, we are all ears.
We would like to help you execute
your idea. If we really like it,
we might even fund it.

services.s_content:
DESIGN & BRANDING

Website, Apps, Interactive Solutions, Brand Identity, Catalogues, Packaging, Brochures, Leaflets, Flyers, Events, Retail Spaces            

 

SOCIAL MEDIA

Social Media Strategy, Content Creations, Platform Management

 

STRATEGY

Branding, Digital Integrated Marketing, Communications Planning, Product Development, Research and Development,
E-commerce, Education

 

ADVERTISING

TV commercials, Web films, Social Media, Branded Content, Print & Publishing, POSM,
Out of Home, Activation
